meanings.definition: A person who engages in a pursuit, especially a sport, on an unpaid basis.
meanings.sent1: The group of amateurs played soccer every weekend for fun.
meanings.sent2: The amateurs joined the local basketball league without any professional training.
meanings.sent3: The amateurs decided to challenge the national team to a friendly match.
meanings.sent4: In the world of soccer, amateurs are the heart and soul of the game.
meanings.sent5: The amateurs' passion for the sport was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: A person who is inexperienced or unskilled in a particular activity.
meanings.sent1: The amateurs struggled to paint a straight line on the wall.
meanings.sent2: She felt like an amateur when trying to bake her first cake.
meanings.sent3: The amateurs attempted to fix the car but ended up making it worse.
meanings.sent4: Being an amateur photographer, he captured moments with raw authenticity.
meanings.sent5: The amateurs' lack of experience was evident in their performance.
